parametrized_description: A woman must consume two types of meal preps: Smoothies and Protein Bars. Each Smoothie provides ProteinPerSmoothie units of protein and CaloriesPerSmoothie calories. Each Protein Bar provides ProteinPerBar units of protein and CaloriesPerBar calories. The number of Protein Bars consumed must be BarToSmoothieRatio times the number of Smoothies. The total calorie intake must not exceed MaxCalories. Determine the quantities of Smoothies and Protein Bars to maximize total protein intake.

ProteinPerBar.description: Amount of protein per protein bar

CaloriesPerBar.description: Amount of calories per protein bar

BarToSmoothieRatio.description: Ratio of protein bars to smoothies

NumberProteinBars.description: The number of protein bars selected

constraints.description: The total calorie intake from Smoothies and Protein Bars must not exceed MaxCalories.
The number of Protein Bars consumed must be BarToSmoothieRatio times the number of Smoothies.

objective.description: Maximize the total protein intake, which is the sum of the protein from Smoothies and Protein Bars.
